lender.name: BrazilRocks
lender.loan_because:
BrazilRocks La referencia es el profesional seeking the granite and the marble. Works for enterprises of the sector of rocks and stone ornamentales. The operation is simple. Firstly, the consumer performs the search in our site. To inform the companies and reported directly to consumers to their business. We mediate in the purchase and sale between the suppliers and marble. Con seguridad y agilidad marmorea to take most of the information of the market. You can do a quick search on the registered products for the providers and, through our website, request information from the request.
Distribute their products and services at the world. The area of interest here: blocks, plancha, work, custom tiles, the benefit paid for services, tailored pieces and Logistics. El BrazilRocks is the real basis for the search of marble (architects, engineers, architects, designers and builders) pueden disfrutar de la hoja de datos de los materiales completely exposed.
In addition to advertising space for your company, our website cuenta con noticias de la industria, la información sobre las asociaciones of marble, the calendar of holidays, advice, techniques and concepts of Caniço on a marble. Registrarse and obtain the most complete source of online consultation and cotización. La responsabilidad y la innovación BrazilRocks to expand the limits of their business.
BrazilRocks La referencia es el profesional seeking the granite and the marble.Works for enterprises del sector de lãs rocas.
www.rochasbrasil.com.br
lender.occupational_info:
What is BrazilRocks? The BrazilRocks is the first in searches for products and services related to the whole sector of ornamental rocks and stones. The BrasilRocks connects consumers exclusively the whole sector of ornamental rocks and stones, the firms in the same sector, selling or not the Internet. The BrazilRocks not sell any product or offer, just show the consumer where he can find the products you want, with the value and payment within their expectations. Show your company, products and services to millions of consumers in Brazil and abroad, it was easier.
www.rochasbrasil.com.br

lender.loan_because: Because we are a blessing to be a blessing unto others~
lender.occupational_info:
Being the woman that God has called me to be..I am a firm believer of Jesus Christ. He lives in me. Accept Jesus in your heart today with this simple prayer.... You can pray by yourself, using your own words. There is no special formula. Just pray from your heart to God, and He will save you. If you feel lost and just don’t know what to pray, here’s a prayer of salvation that you can pray:
Dear Lord, I admit that I am a sinner. I have done many things that don’t please you. I have lived my life for myself. I am sorry and I repent. I ask you to forgive me. I believe that you died on the cross for me, to save me. You did what I could not do for myself. I come to you now and ask you to take control of my life, I give it to you. Help me to live every day in a way that pleases you. I love you, Lord, and I thank you that I will spend all eternity with you.
Amen

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: God loves people. Faith and love without action are dead.

lender.loan_because:
I to expand the house to a room for rent, cause were so near to a mall which is lot of employee looking for a room for rent,for me it is advantage to have that business that's why I want to lend i need at least P50,000.00.
I hope I can lend to kiva
lender.occupational_info: My work as a sales representative, we call a client to order our product like computer set, license's, ink's and toner's for printer, hardware of computer's all parts of computer, I have basic salary and commission.

lender.name: Scott

lender.name: Creekside Communication

lender.name: Joanna

lender.occupational_info: I spend most of my time caring for my 1 year old daughter and my husband. I also teach acting classes to college students.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: this is the only way to go out of poverty and motivate the right people to do it

lender.name: Arief Prajogo

lender.name: Janie
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me my first opportunity to loan as a birthday gift and I am so thrilled as it is such a wonderful way to help...even on a small scale. I look forward to many more "reinvestments"!

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: It's real, it's sensible, it's practical, a gesture of responsibility to others who share space with me on this ever-shrinking planet.
lender.occupational_info: Woodwind player and teacher. Freelance gigs and membership in River City Big Band (Edmonton).

lender.name: Derrell
lender.loan_because: Feel that GOD has given me a desire to help the ones that can't help themselves.This is a small gift that I can give.

lender.name: George Hancocks
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that my small loan is helping someone get ahead. I especially enjoy knowing something personal about that person or group..
lender.occupational_info: I have been a writer and magazine editor all my working life. Now retired, I search Kiva as often as I can for opportunities to help others reach the same quiet space.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with always having what I've needed in life. It is my responsibility to give to those who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia and am currently in 11th grade.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I grew up in poverty, with no electricity or running water, and have become successful and prosperous. I want to help others reach their goals and become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the state I live in, helping low income and needy individuals get much needed state and federally funded medical insurance.

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: Small things can change a lot.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to understand very small things.

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: I have had so very many things go right for me in my world. I want to share some of that good fortune with others.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: When people can support themselves, they're less susceptible to negative influences. My life is good, I want other lives to be good as well
lender.occupational_info: Retired Federal employee; volunteer at several organizations in my community.

lender.name: Afrah
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Kathy

lender.name: tanya

lender.name: John

lender.occupational_info: build telephone and internet networks

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: People need access to money and hope.

lender.name: Suraj Manandhar
lender.loan_because: I would like to see people succeed and don't want money to be the reason not to pursue their dream.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because:
I AM LOOKING FOR A WORKING CAPITAL TO START SELLING COMPUTERS AND COMPUTER ACCESSORIES.
My name is Stephen I am 39 yrs old. Please save my family and don’t let us die of hunger and shame. I am a computer engineer based in Lagos, Nigeria I am looking for a working capital of $2,500 to be selling computers and computer accessories. This is what I knew doing best. Nigeria has a larger market for computer and computer accessories. I knew where to buy the computers and good quality computer accessories at a very good price for Nigeria local market with a good reasonable profit.
lender.occupational_info:
The business is purely buying and selling of computers and computer accessories and it is profitable and I am sure of paying back the loan within three (3) months. I am not gamble with the money I have many years working experience in computer business. I knew where to buy goods at a good price to resale here in Nigeria to give me good profit, I knew exactly what to buy and where to sale at wholesales. Not getting money to start this business is killing my dreams. Please help me for God sake.
Mode of shipment from where I buy the goods to Nigeria where I intend to sale is through courier services and it usually between 3 – 5 working days. I knew what to order that the weight will not be heavy so that I don’t spend too much money on shipment
I have experienced in this business. I knew what to buy and where to sale. I already know the selling price from where I will buy the goods before I order the goods and I also know the selling price here in Nigeria so there is no way I can loss. There secret of every successful business is to know where to buy goods at a cheap price and to know where to sale with a reasonable profit.
Please give me a chance to put my experiences of many years into use. Help me start my own business and put a smile in my family face. Save me and my family from hunger. I am sure of paying back the loan within 3 months. Please help me and let my dream come true in life. All your effort in life will not be in vain.
I had been suffering for many years because I do not have money to start buying goods to sale. Help me. All I wanted is to become an importer in selling computer and computer accessories. All I need to start this business is $2,500 I believe in starting small and grow big. I am 100 % sure that with a loan of $2,500 I can grow the business to a very big and successful business within some few months. Little drops of water make a mighty ocean.
If God torches your heart and you wish to help to put a smile in my face or go into partnership with me in this type of business kindly contact me on
Stephenmata@yahoo.com or +234 80 89341167
You will be glad you did. It is a very profitable business. There is no business like buying and selling. And the secret of every successful business is to know where to buy goods at a cheaper price and know where to sale to make a profit.
Stephen B. Smile Stephenmata@yahoo.com

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: Big changes start with small actions.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school English at a public school in Houston, Texas.

lender.occupational_info: I work at a University. I am in charge of keeping our 350 computers working.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want others to have a chance to have a better life, keeping their dignity untouched. That's why I prefer lending than giving.
lender.occupational_info: In a few words, I help companies to install and setup complex business software into big computers.

lender.occupational_info: I keep computer networks running at their best so that our clients can run their businesses better, allowing them to spend more time with their families and friends.

lender.name: Jai

lender.occupational_info: Eat and Sleep.

lender.loan_because: We should all share what we can.
lender.occupational_info: i am a student at Mendocino College. I study biology.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I lend to families and individuals who wish to improve their technological literacy. As a college student researching the digital divide, it is very important to me to help others "make it" in the information age. I'm a passionate computer nerd and appreciate the skills I was able to gain thanks to a gift of technology at an early age.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I'm in a position to help someone else stand on thier own.

lender.name: Arushi
lender.loan_because: I love to loan!!!!!

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel soooo good!
lender.occupational_info: I wrote a book, "I'm Hot!...and I'm Bald!": CHEMOTHERAPY FOR WINNERS, to help people handle the side effects of chemo, but most of all to help them overcome the fear of the treatment that can save their lives.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to have a roof over my head, food on the table, and clean water to everyday. If a little extra money can help someone around the world move closer to their goals and better life, then I'm grateful to be a part of that.
